links.title: Apple bets $600 million on improving Apple Watch, iPhone battery life
links.description: Apple struck a huge deal that will push its chip-making ambitions forward. The tech giant agreed to pay $600 million in total to Dialog Semiconductor, a UK-based chipmaker that has been working with Apple since the first iPhones came out.

messages.body: Margin Call: Burst Of Sell Orders At 2:43PM Was Highest Since The Flash Crash $SPY $QQQ $EEM $AAPL $BABA $NVDA $JPM https://www.zerohedge.com/news/2018-10-11/what-liquidation-panic-looks-burst-sell-orders-243pm-was-highest-flash-crash?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+zerohedge%2Ffeed+%28zero+hedge+-+on+a+long+enough+timeline%2C+the+survival+rate+for+everyone+drops+to+zero%29

links.title: Margin Call: Burst Of Sell Orders At 2:43PM Was Highest Since The Flash Crash
links.description: Earlier today, when looking at yesterday's dramatic market plunge, we highlighted a note from BMO technical analyst Russ Visch who showed that, according go the NYSE "ARMS" Index which is a means of determining market strength or weakness by analyzing the relationship between advancing stocks and declining stocks and their respective volumes, Wednesday's selling pressure was actually not that high despite the seemingly relentless push lower in stocks in the afternoon.

messages.body: $AAPL https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/11/cramer-buy-stocks-on-friday-after-sell-off--we-are-oversold.html?recirc=taboolainternal

links.title: Cramer says it's time to buy stocks on Friday after massive sell-off: 'We are oversold'
links.description: One name Cramer likes is Amazon, even though the stock is trading at over $1,750 a share. So if someone wants to buy 10 shares, they should buy two, he said. "I don't know when you buy Amazon other than it's when down big and people are really scared," he said.
